label: 大膳職
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: The Palace Table Office (within the Kunaishō, the Imperial Household Ministry), headed by a Master (Daibu) and a Provisional Master, supplied the food at official banquets.  It had a large staff of cooks, as well as fishermen and hunters who supplemented the stocks of provisions acquired through the tax system (p. 811). [宮内省、大夫]
